name: Missile Dodge (Voloe)
description:
Missile Dodge is a high score based game where you control a flying pig of all things and dodge incoming projectiles. Some say they look like highly dangerous explosives, though upon closer inspection, they look more like toy bottle rockets?

Goal: Keep piggy in the air while avoiding the flying bottl- I mean missiles. 

Relive a blast from past (literally if your not careful with piggy) with this retro arcade game.

*Currently still in development with new releases coming soon. Developed using Pygame.  

For more information, visit the repository: https://github.com/Yungxi/MissileDodgeBeta/watchers
